backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data models (Donation, Donor, Spending, UserProfile, ContactForm, DonorPrivacy) and including authorization and blob storage mixins for a charitable trust donation platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of Google site verification meta tag to frontend/index.html with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend React components, pages, and hooks including routing, authentication, admin features, donation tracking, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter cards, Google site verification, structured data schema for NGO, and links to sitemap/robots.txt.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all search engines to crawl the site with a 1-second crawl delay and sitemap reference.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all public pages (home, donate, ledger, donors, about, contact, services) with priorities and change frequencies for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component configuring TanStack Router with public routes (wrapped in SiteLayout) and admin routes (wrapped in AdminLayout), plus ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNotif: Admin-only notification bell popover component that currently displays an empty state placeholder for future donation and spending activity notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpendingFo: Form component for admins to record trust spending with amount (in INR converted to paise), description, and balance validation. Displays success toast and notifies partner on submission.
Route guard component that checks if the authenticated user has admin permissions, showing loading state or access denied screen as appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login screen component displaying a welcome card with Internet Identity sign-in button and loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable login/logout button component that handles Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time users to set up their profile with name, age, email, phone (validated Indian format), and gender. Cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/donate/DonationF: Main donation form handling user details, amount (min ₹10), payment screenshot upload with preview, and submission with validation. Generates payment reference and converts amount to paise.
frontend/src/components/donate/UpiPaymen: Step 1 payment instructions component displaying UPI IDs, amount, and payment reference with copy-to-clipboard functionality for each field.
frontend/src/components/donors/DonorsTab: Table component displaying donor profiles with avatar, name, join date, and total donated amount. Rows are clickable to navigate to individual donor detail pages.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Error screen component showing access denied message with shield icon and button to return to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Proverb: A card component that displays a proverb to donors and collects like/dislike feedback, showing a thank-you message after submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin portal layout with navigation to dashboard, donations, and spending pages, including mobile menu support and admin guard protection.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component displaying copyright, mission statement, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Main site header with logo, navigation menu, live metrics bar (total views and live viewers), and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Root layout wrapper that handles authentication gating, profile setup modal, view tracking, and renders header/footer with page content.
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerFil: Filter controls for the ledger page allowing users to filter by transaction type (all/incoming/outgoing) and sort order (newest/oldest).
frontend/src/components/ledger/LedgerTab: Table component displaying transaction records with type icons, descriptions, dates, amounts in INR, and status badges, with clickable rows linking to transaction details.
frontend/src/components/ledger/RecentTra: Card component showing the 10 most recent transactions (donations and spending combined) sorted by timestamp, with navigation to full ledger and transaction details.
frontend/src/components/ledger/SpendingB: React component that displays a pie chart breakdown of spending records by category (Food, Education, Healthcare, Shelter, Clothing, Other) using Recharts, with category detection based on description keywords.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Form component for creating or editing service activity entries with title, description, author, notes, and image uploads; handles file validation, upload progress tracking, and submission via mutations.
Displays a list of service activity entries as cards with image carousels, metadata (date, author, image count), description, and optional notes.
frontend/src/config/upi.ts: Configuration file defining UPI payment details including primary and secondary VPA IDs, payee name, and merchant code for non-profit donations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication via Internet Identity, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: React hook that queries the backend to determine if the current authenticated user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence in local storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
Custom React hook that synchronizes state with localStorage, providing a useState-like interface with automatic persistence and SSR safety.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including trust balance, donations, spending, site metrics, user profiles, donor profiles, service activities, and admin operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewTracking.ts: Provides two hooks: useViewTracking() registers a single page view per session with retry logic and exponential backoff, and useLiveViewerSession() manages live viewer sessions with heartbeats and automatic cleanup on page unload.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, including colors for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and chart elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays information about the organization's founders (two 18-year-old engineering students), their vision for transparent giving, mission statement, and core values using card-based layout components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDonationsP: Admin page for managing donations with pending and recent donation lists, allowing admins to confirm or decline donations with payment screenshot verification.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPortalPage: Admin dashboard landing page displaying quick stats (trust balance, site views, live viewers) and navigation cards to donation and spending management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSpendingPa: Admin page for recording new spending records and viewing recent spending history, with available trust balance display.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation for name, email, Indian phone numbers, message, and inquiry type that submits to the backend actor's submitContactForm method with error handling and success notifications.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main landing page displaying hero section with call-to-action buttons, financial statistics cards (balance, donations, spending), spending breakdown, and recent transactions using data from multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DomainSetupPage.tsx: Documentation page providing step-by-step instructions for configuring DNS records (CNAME and TXT) to point a custom domain (whynotus.org.in) to an Internet Computer canister with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donation page component that displays a donation form with UPI payment instructions, features cards highlighting verification and transparency, and shows donation process information. Supports both authenticated and anonymous donations.
frontend/src/pages/DonorDetailPage.tsx: Donor detail page that displays comprehensive donor profile information including avatar, contact details, and donation history. Shows full profile data to admins and masked/public data to regular users.
frontend/src/pages/DonorsPage.tsx: Donors listing page that displays all donors in a table format. Fetches and shows full donor profiles for admins or public profiles for regular users.
frontend/src/pages/LedgerPage.tsx: Transaction ledger page that combines and displays both donations (incoming) and spending records (outgoing) with filtering by transaction type and sorting by date. Provides complete financial transparency.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectBriefPage.tsx: Project brief documentation page with a textarea for entering website requirements and summaries. Features auto-save to localStorage, copy to clipboard, and export as text file functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page displaying service activities showing how donations are used. Includes admin controls for adding, editing, and deleting service activities with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionDetailPage: Displays detailed information for a single transaction (donation or spending record) by ID, including status badges, formatted amounts, and conditionally shows a proverb feedback prompt for confirmed female donations without feedback.
frontend/src/utils/approvedImage.ts: Exports the single source of truth path for the hero/dashboard promotional image asset.
frontend/src/utils/canisterError.ts: Utility function to extract user-friendly error messages from canister/agent errors by parsing reject text, trap messages, and error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/donationInputNormaliz: Provides normalization and validation functions for Indian phone numbers, UTR codes, and amounts to handle mobile formatting (spaces, hyphens, commas) in donation forms.
frontend/src/utils/donorAvatarImage.ts: Exports the single source of truth path for the donor avatar image asset used across all donor profiles.
frontend/src/utils/fileToUint8Array.ts: Converts a File object to Uint8Array using FileReader for blob storage uploads.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats bigint amounts in minor units (paise) as Indian Rupees with proper locale formatting and ₹ symbol.
frontend/src/utils/maskUtr.ts: Empty utility file, likely intended for UTR masking functionality but currently contains no code.
frontend/src/utils/paymentReference.ts: Generates short, human-readable payment reference codes using crypto-safe randomness with alphanumeric characters excluding ambiguous ones.
frontend/src/utils/phoneMask.ts: Exports a function to mask phone numbers by showing only the first 5 characters followed by asterisks, used as a defensive fallback for non-admin views.
frontend/src/utils/siteBranding.ts: Exports site branding asset paths (logo, favicon) and re-exports domain configuration constants from siteConfig.ts.
frontend/src/utils/siteConfig.ts: Centralized site configuration including domain (whynotus.org.in), site name, environment detection, and utility functions for building canonical URLs and extracting canister IDs.
frontend/src/utils/upiDiagnostics.ts: Generates user-friendly, copyable diagnostic text for UPI payment issues, excluding sensitive data like phone, email, and UTR.
frontend/src/utils/upiQrImage.ts: Exports UPI QR code image path, version constant for cache-busting, and a helper function to get the cache-busted QR URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and parameter cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a feature request to add Google site verification meta tag to the frontend index.html head section.
